CustomField.description: New Salesforce order number = BriefName__r.OrderNumber__c + LineNumber__c (3 digits). For example, P0235831001 for PERSO (used for T&T to update sub-status) or SP01234567001 (for SPO) (value will be set by Process Builder when the Firm Order is created)
CustomField.label: Firm Order Number (technical)
